Title: Authorizes healthcare facilities and professions to pay for the fair market value of practice management, billing or health information technology services
Summary: Authorizes healthcare facilities and professionals to pay for the fair market value of practice management, billing or health information technology services.
LawCode: Amd §2811, Pub Health L; amd §§6509-a & 6530, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health and education law, in relation to the provision of practice management, billing and health information technology services for healthcare facilities and professionals
